attributes.description:
Renault Kwid Kwid 1.0 Dynamique / Zen 5dr
2021 model Kwid in excellent condition. Full service history. Central locking, airbag, aircon, radio with bluetooth and USB. Power steering. Reverse camera with sensors to assist with parking. Manual transmission that allows for a comfortable drive, it also has great fuel consumption. It has black and red cloth on the interior and the exterior is silver. Visit your KIA Konfidence dealership in the Westrand, situated in Wilropark, Roodepoort and book this Dynamique Kwid for a test drive. Trade ins accepted. Nationwide delivery.

attributes.description: At Kia Konfidence Wonderboom we pride ourselves on delivering quality Pre-Owned vehicles to our clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125-quality point check, Dekra roadworthy, Dekra Condition report and a valet before being delivered . All vehicles are delivered with a full service history. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Family and family look after each other. We will tailor make a package that will not only suit your needs and your pocket too. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you for a test drive from the comfort of your own home or workplace. Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome.
